name: Aloor dargah sayyid sulaiman qahiri jeelani (r.a)
description: The Aloor Dargah of Sayyid Sulaiman Qahiri Jeelani (R.A.) is a revered Sufi shrine in Kanyakumari district. It holds significance for its association with Sayyid Sulaiman Qahiri Jeelani, a revered saint in Sufi tradition. The dargah serves as a place of pilgrimage and spiritual retreat, attracting devotees seeking blessings and guidance. It stands as a symbol of faith and devotion, fostering a sense of spiritual community and reverence among its visitors.
